entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
